name: Butterfree
description: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables it to collect honey, even in the heaviest of rains.

attacks.name: Cure Powder
attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
